name: hyperactive
description: The hyperactive suite of web application development tools
author: Muthu Kumar <@MKRhere> (https://mkr.pw)

scripts.preinstall: node -e "!process.env.npm_config_user_agent.startsWith('pnpm/') && !console.log('Use \`npm i -g pnpm\` and \`pnpm --recursive install\` to install dependencies in this repository\n') && process.exit(1)"
